description: Transform EOMY from functional to delightful - applying Steve Jobs/Jony Ive design philosophy with Stripe/Mercury sophistication. Navy trust palette, Inter typography, 8px grid, subtle shadows, and micro-interactions.

userStories.title: Design Token System
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a centralized design token system in Tailwind so that all components share consistent visual language.
acceptanceCriteria: Define color palette: slate-900 navy, teal-600 accent, amber-400 ratings
Define custom shadows: sm, md, lg, xl with navy-tinted rgba
Update globals.css with CSS custom properties
All existing components compile without errors
userStories.notes: Foundation story - must come first. Use slate color palette for navy tones.

userStories.title: Typography Refinement with Inter
userStories.description: As a user, I want typography that is clear, scannable, and feels premium.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Inter font via next/font/google with variable weights
userStories.notes: Inter from Google Fonts. Use negative letter-spacing for headlines.

userStories.title: Card Component Redesign
userStories.description: As a member browsing recommendations, I want cards that communicate quality and trust at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Shadow at rest: shadow-md, hover: shadow-lg with 200ms transition
Category badge: rounded-full, teal-100/teal-700 for recommends
Star rating uses amber-400 fill color
userStories.notes: Apply to both RecommendCard and NeedCard. NeedCard uses blue-100/blue-700 badges.

userStories.title: Navigation Header Simplification
userStories.description: As a member, I want navigation that's always available but never intrusive.
acceptanceCriteria: Nav tabs as text links, active has teal-600 with border-b-2
Clean minimal design - remove any gradient backgrounds
userStories.notes: Simplify - less is more. The content is the hero, not the nav.

userStories.title: Hero Section Redesign
userStories.description: As a member landing on homepage, I want to immediately understand value with a dramatic welcome.
acceptanceCriteria: Full-width hero with bg-gradient-to-b from-slate-900 to-slate-800
Heading: 'Find What You Need. Share What You Know.' text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-white
Subheading: 'Trusted resources from EO Malaysia members' text-lg text-slate-300
Hero height: min-h-[40vh] on desktop, min-h-[30vh] on mobile
Clean minimal - remove busy sections from hero area
userStories.notes: Jobs keynote style - one big idea per screen. Dramatic dark background.

userStories.title: Search Experience Enhancement
userStories.description: As a member searching, I want search to feel instant and magical like Mac Spotlight.
acceptanceCriteria: Border: border-2 border-slate-200, focus:border-teal-500 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-teal-500/20
Search icon (w-5 h-5) on left in slate-400
Clear X button appears when input has value
Placeholder: 'Search accountants, lawyers, IT services...' in slate-400
userStories.notes: Make search the magnetic center. Focus state with ring glow.

userStories.title: Category Pills Polish
userStories.description: As a member exploring, I want category pills that feel tactile and elegant.
userStories.notes: Pills should feel like physical buttons you want to press.

userStories.title: Filter UI Elegance
userStories.description: As a member refining results, I want filters that are discoverable but unobtrusive.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop: horizontal flex row with gap-3
Filter buttons: h-10 rounded-full border border-slate-200
Active shows value not label (e.g., 'Legal' not 'Category')
Selected option has check icon in teal-600
userStories.notes: Filters are tools, not obstacles. Show active state clearly.

userStories.title: Form Field Styling
userStories.description: As a member filling forms, I want inputs that feel modern and spacious.
acceptanceCriteria: Input height: h-13 (52px) for touch-friendly targets
userStories.notes: Apply to recommend/new form and ReviewForm component.

userStories.title: Button System
userStories.description: As a member clicking buttons, I want them to feel confident and inviting.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary: bg-teal-600 text-white h-12 (48px) rounded-lg px-8 font-semibold
userStories.notes: Buttons are commitments. Make them feel like confident handshakes.

userStories.title: Empty State Design
userStories.description: As a member seeing no results, I want helpful guidance not frustration.
acceptanceCriteria: Add subtle SVG illustration or icon (search with magnifying glass)
Supportive text: text-base text-slate-600 max-w-md mx-auto
Secondary link for 'Clear filters' or 'Browse all'
Keep popular recommendations section as alternatives
userStories.notes: Empty states are opportunities to guide, not dead ends.

userStories.title: Loading Skeleton Refinement
userStories.description: As a member waiting for content, I want loading to feel fast.
acceptanceCriteria: Add shimmer effect with gradient animation if possible
Skeleton shapes match actual card layout (title, description, badge areas)
Card skeleton height matches actual card (~220px)
userStories.notes: Skeletons reduce perceived wait time significantly.

userStories.title: Business Detail Page Polish
userStories.description: As a member viewing a recommendation, I want it to feel like a premium profile.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero area with bg-gradient-to-b from-slate-50 to-white
Business name: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-slate-900
Star rating prominent with numeric value (text-xl font-semibold)
Contact card: bg-white shadow-md rounded-xl p-6
CTA: 'Visit Website' as primary teal button, 'Call' as secondary outline
userStories.notes: Detail pages build trust. Make them feel premium.

userStories.title: Reviews Section Enhancement
userStories.description: As a member reading reviews, I want them to feel authentic and trustworthy.
acceptanceCriteria: Section heading with review count and average rating
Rating breakdown: horizontal bars with bg-amber-400 on bg-slate-200
Each bar shows percentage width based on count
Individual reviews: border border-slate-200 rounded-lg p-4
Reviewer name and date inline with stars
Empty state: encouraging 'Be the first to review' message
userStories.notes: Reviews are social proof. Make them feel like real testimonials.

userStories.title: Mobile Bottom Navigation
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want thumb-friendly navigation at the bottom.
acceptanceCriteria: Show only on mobile: block lg:hidden
Icons: w-6 h-6, labels: text-xs below icons
Safe area padding: pb-safe or pb-6 for notched phones
Add button: centered, elevated with bg-teal-600 text-white rounded-full
userStories.notes: Mobile navigation in thumb zone. Instagram-style bottom bar.

userStories.title: Micro-interactions and Hover Effects
userStories.description: As a user interacting with the interface, I want subtle feedback that feels alive.
acceptanceCriteria: Active states: active:scale-[0.98] for pressable elements
All transitions use duration-150 or duration-200
userStories.notes: Micro-interactions make interfaces feel alive. Subtle is key.
